p: In order to simulate the function of gas work, 10 mg of the NGO powder prepared under vacuum freeze-drying conditions was weighed to press out a 10 mm diameter NGO tablet and put in the bottom end of the syringe. The small hole at the front of the syringe was sealed by PTFE tape and the NGO was heated by an alcohol burner. The value was determined after the tube cooling to room temperature.
